name: You are the hero (DeathKnight)
description:
Game made for Yogscast Game Jam 2020 with the theme "surprise".

Title: You are the hero

Code made by: Tommy Kobberø Andersen (http://mightycodedragon.com) 

Game description: A game with a lot of surprises. :D 3 endings. 

Game engine: Unity 2020.1.14f1

Assets referencer: 

Graphics: 

  • 2d alien: https://opengameart.org/content/alien-4
  • Hero: https://opengameart.org/content/harvett-fox-player-character-sheet
  • Platform tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-tile-sheet
  • Spaceship background: https://pixabay.com/photos/spaceship-science-fiction-forward-3628969/
  • Spiritualism background: https://pixabay.com/photos/spiritualism-awakening-meditation-4552237/
